ScanMarkets provides Trending Stocks & Financial News in every new tab.You are provided with real-time trending stock charts and curated financial news, all in one place to deliver an unrivaled experience for tracking the hottest stocks and staying updated on the latest financial trends.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the ScanMarkets extension and set the new tab search to that provided by the service. The search will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

All our finance news are provided from the public RSS feed of Fox Business.

Privacy Policy: https://scanmarkets.org/privacy/

Terms of Service: https://scanmarkets.org/terms/

About Us: https://scanmarkets.org/about/

With ScanMarkets, you can effortlessly monitor trending stocks and analyze their performance through dynamic and interactive stock charts.
